Garrosh.name: Groundbreaker
Garrosh.description: Deal 81 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are pulled toward Garrosh.

Garrosh.name: Bloodthirst
Garrosh.description: Deal 156 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

Garrosh.name: Wrecking Ball
Garrosh.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Warlord's Challenge
Garrosh.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Decimate
Garrosh.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Garrosh.name: Armor Up
Garrosh.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

1.name: Body Check
1.description: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 30% for 3 seconds.  Damage is increased by 200% of Armor Up's current bonus, and the Slow amount is increased by 30% if Armor Up's bonus is above 25.

1.name: Unrivaled Strength
1.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 30% and its damage by 125%.

1.name: Warbreaker
1.description: Quest: Pull Heroes with Groundbreaker. Reward: After pulling 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker deals an additional 150 damage over 3 seconds to Heroes. Reward: After pulling 15 Heroes, reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: In for the Kill
4.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

4.name: Indomitable
4.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Thirst for Battle
4.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

7.name: Brute Force
7.description: Enemies hit by Body Check receive 50% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

7.name: Intimidation
7.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Into the Fray
7.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

7.name: Oppressor
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Decimate
10.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Warlord's Challenge
10.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Bloodcraze
13.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 10% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Defensive Measures
13.description: Pulling a Hero with Groundbreaker grants Garrosh a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

13.name: Double Up
13.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Earthshaker
16.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Mortal Combo
16.description: If Wrecking Ball is used on a Hero within 2 seconds of pulling them with Groundbreaker, Wrecking Ball's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

16.name: Rough Landing
16.description: Heroes pulled by Groundbreaker are Slowed by 50% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Deadly Calm
20.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 20% less damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Death Wish
20.description: Increase the duration of Warlord's Challenge by 0.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is killed while affected by Warlord's challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

20.name: Inner Rage
20.description: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges 100% faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above 25.

20.name: Titanic Might
20.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.
